Popular Services

Vehicle Repair

We have a proven track record with over 12 years of experience in the industry, so you can rest assured that your vehicle is in safe hands.

Turn over

Vehicle Repair

How Do You Calculate Cost?

We price all jobs based on a fixed labour fee of £60 per hour plus any charges incurred for replacement parts, vehicle collection/drop off and fault diagnosis.

How does it work?

If you already know what is wrong with your vehicle then it is a simple matter of us buying any required parts and fitting them (on which we will update you consistently while your car is in our hands). If you are unaware of the issue we will use our diagnostic equipment to identify any required repairs and then inform you of our findings before carrying out any work.

Turn over

Fault Diagnosis

If you aren't quite sure what is wrong with your vehicle, we'd be happy to take a look at it and provide you with a comprehensive report of our findings.

Turn over

Fault Diagnosis

How Much Does it Cost?

Usually we will incorporate diagnosis into the final price which we quote for the work carried out. However, if you just wish for a diagnosis the price is £35.

How Does it Work?

Our first port of call will always be to listen to any symptoms which you may have noticed. Once we have an idea of where the problem lies we will hook the vehicle up to our diagnostic equipment and check for any fault codes. Upon detection of an issue we will contact you and inform you of your options regarding repair.

Turn over

MOT & Servicing

Is your annual MOT creeping up on you? We are fully certified to carry out MOT inspections and issue certifications to vehicles which successfully pass.

Turn over

MOT & Servicing

How Long Does it Take?

Generally speaking an MOT examination will take between 45 and 60 minutes although this can vary depending on the vehicle and whether there are any complications.

How Much Does it Cost?

We charge a flat fee of £50 for an MOT examination. If your vehicle fails the initial examination we will inform you of any repairs which are required to make it roadworthy and, if you allow us to complete said repairs, we will retest your vehicle for free.

Turn over

Tyre Replacement & Repair

Have you got a slow puncture or flat tyre? If so, we are able to collect your vehicle from its current location and replace the faulty tyre.

Turn over

Tyre Replacement & Repair

How Much Does it Cost?

Due to the widely varying price of tyres (dependant on brand, size, tread and condition) we cannot give a one price fits all quote. If you find yourself in need of a tyre give us a call on 07789 934355 or pay a visit to our garage.

How Does it Work?

If you can drive your vehicle to our garage we will assess the status of the tyre which requires our attention and then inform you of your options regarding replacement or repair. If your tyre is completely flat we can arrange to have your vehicle picked up and then inform you of your options regarding a replacement.

Turn over

Collection & Drop off

If, for whatever reason, you can't get your vehicle to us we'd be happy to come and collect it from its current location. We can also arrange to have your car returned to a location of your choice, when it is repaired.

Turn over

Collection & Drop off

How Much Does it Cost?

If your vehicle is within 10 miles of our garage we would be happy to collect it vehicle from its current location and drop it off when we have completed the necessary repairs free of charge. For vehicles which are over 10 miles away please call our garage on 07789934355 to get a quote.

How Does it Work?

When you contact us to book your vehicle into our garage we will ask you if you would like it to be collected and then work out a time which is convenient for you. We will then arrive with a courtesy car (at no extra cost) which you can use freely until your vehicle has been repaired and returned to you.

Turn over

Why Choose Us?

Having been in the industry for over 12 years we have a proven track record in repairing mechanical, electrical and hydraulic systems. We have a fully equipped workshop with high precision tools to aid us with repairs and fault diagnosis.

We have a proven track record within the motoring industry and have received accreditation from multiple trade bodies including the RMI and IMI.

We have also received multiple awards for our work on the trusted whocanfixmycar.com website, including their coveted National Top Performer and Gold Customer Service badges.
